body: Now that I came to think, abortion is possible even on the second trimester, and at that point, 14 to 16 weeks, the girl should have already noticed she didn't have a normal menstrual period (i.e. a month has more or less four weeks, and if menstrual period is around once each month, and, 12 weeks are three months (16 four months), wouldn't the girl, in all honesty, noticed? body:

Fuck on the road netflix edition

The last 8 pages aren't part of the actual story, it's the original rough draft story which turned into Fork in the Road so it's at the end as more of a bonus. The other 4 extra pages takes place before the last chapter, so it's not an epilogue.

The mc is the girl. BF is a dumbass but he didn't act like that for no reason. He thought that by keeping her away till he felt more grown up and able to keep them both secure financially, she'd see him as dependable unfortunately he later erroneously assumes his keeping her away made her feel lonely but sadly it turns out she was an unknowing slut. She was raped and then seduced by her rapist and went along with it so the lonely excuse falls dead before that actually became real in pt2. Had he known he wouldn't have stayed but he was way too nice and figured he caused the problem when it's shown she was a late blooming slut unbeknownst even to her.


Anywho, I rate the rapist douche an incorrigible waste of skin

The girl an unintentional piece of shit who started as a victim but became less and less innocent as it went on till she flat out turned into crud with some guilt.

Bf is a poor sap who ended up naively cucking himself and wrongly blamed himself because he pushed her away
